home_description: ShopWise helps you understand your spending, find the best prices, and create smart shopping lists. Take control of your finances with powerful insights.
powerful_features_description: Everything you need to manage your family's shopping.
feature_visual_insights_description: Interactive charts show where your money is going.
feature_camera_register_description: Scan receipts with your camera to automatically add purchases.
feature_smart_lists_description: AI suggests items you might need based on your buying habits.
feature_full_control_description: Manage your profile, preferences, and family settings with ease.
login_description: Enter your credentials to access your account.
signup_description: Join ShopWise and start saving today.
dashboard_consumption_overview_desc: Your spending evolution over the last 12 months.
dashboard_top_expenses_desc: The products that had the most impact on your budget this month.
purchase_history_description: View, filter, and search all your past purchases.
empty_state_no_history_desc: Your purchase history is empty. Start by adding a new purchase on the Scan page.
empty_state_no_recommendations_desc: As you add more purchases, we'll provide personalized savings recommendations here.
shopping_list_description: Manage your active shopping list here. Add, edit, and check off items as you shop.
suggestions_based_on_history: Based on your purchase history, you might also need:
error_getting_suggestions_desc: There was an error while trying to get suggestions from the AI.
add_purchase_description: Scan a receipt QR code, import a PDF, or enter items manually.
settings_description: Manage your profile, preferences, and privacy settings.
privacy_delete_data_desc: Permanently delete all your purchase history, lists, and associated data.
privacy_delete_data_note: This action is irreversible. All your data will be permanently lost.
privacy_delete_account_desc: Permanently delete your ShopWise account and all associated data.
privacy_delete_account_note: This action is irreversible. You will lose access to your account and all data.
error_not_logged_in: User not authenticated. Please log in again.
error_saving_purchase: There was an error trying to save your purchase. Please try again.
scan_success_desc_pdf: The data from the PDF has been extracted. Please review the items below before saving.
scan_error_desc_pdf_detailed: Could not extract data from the PDF. Please ensure the file is a valid Brazilian NFC-e and try again.
import_from_pdf_desc: Select the electronic receipt (NFC-e) in PDF format to import the purchase automatically.
edit_item_description: Correct the details of the extracted item here.
family_settings_description: Manage your family composition, frequent establishments, and your plan.
coming_soon_history_desc: The complete history of changes to your family settings will be available here soon.
tab_history_desc: Track changes made to your family settings.
preferences_form_family_size_desc: This information helps our AI to generate more accurate suggestions.
toast_error_not_logged_in: You must be logged in to perform this action.
preferences_form_success_message: Your preferences have been saved successfully!
preferences_form_error_generic: An unexpected error occurred while saving your preferences.
market_form_add_new_desc: Register a new store, market, or fair to your list of favorites.
market_form_favorites_desc: These are the stores you frequent the most. We will prioritize them in analyses.
market_form_ignored_desc: These stores will not be considered in savings suggestions and comparisons.
market_form_toast_added_desc: "{{marketName}}" has been added to your favorites.
market_form_toast_moved_ignored_desc: "{{marketName}}" is now in your ignored list.
market_form_toast_moved_favorites_desc: "{{marketName}}" is now in your favorites list.
market_form_toast_removed_desc: The store has been removed from your family's lists.
plan_form_description: Choose the plan that best suits your family's needs.
plan_form_free_desc: Ideal for getting started and exploring the main features.
plan_form_premium_desc: Unlock the full power of ShopWise with exclusive AI features.
plan_form_upgrade_success: Plan upgraded successfully! Welcome to Premium.
profile_form_info_desc: Update your name as it appears in the application.
profile_form_email_note: To change your email, please contact support.
profile_form_linked_accounts_desc: Connect other accounts for easier login.
profile_form_success_account_linked_desc: Your account has been successfully linked.
profile_form_change_password_desc: For your security, we recommend choosing a strong password.
preferences_form_description: Customize your experience in the application.
preferences_form_push_notifications_desc: Receive alerts about smart lists and savings opportunities.
delete_confirmation_code_prompt: To confirm, please type the following code: <1>{{code}}</1>
privacy_delete_data_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to delete all data?
privacy_delete_data_confirm_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all your purchase history, lists, and other associated data.
privacy_delete_account_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
privacy_delete_account_confirm_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and all data associated with it.
modal_total_spent_desc: Breakdown of your spending at each establishment this month.
modal_items_bought_desc: A list of the most recent items added to your purchase history.
modal_main_category_desc: A visual breakdown of your spending across different categories this month.
modal_potential_savings_desc: A list of products you could have bought for less at other stores.
modal_analysis_loading: The AI is analyzing your data... this may take a moment.
premium_feature_desc_consumption: This detailed consumption analysis is an exclusive feature for Premium users.
empty_state_no_modal_data_desc: We don't have enough information to display these details yet. Add more purchases to get insights.
empty_state_no_chart_desc: Add some purchases to see your spending overview here.
empty_state_no_expenses_desc: Your top expenses for the current month will appear here once you add a purchase.
admin_audit_description: Monitor system integrity and perform diagnostic tests.
admin_audit_content: Area for auditing system logs and running automated tests.
admin_logs_description: View detailed logs of system activities and events.
admin_logs_content: Interface for viewing and filtering system logs.
admin_market_insights_description: Analyze market trends and general consumption patterns.
admin_market_insights_content: Dashboard with general market analysis and product price variations.
admin_notifications_description: Send notifications and announcements to users.
admin_notifications_content: Form for creating and sending push notifications to all users.
admin_dashboard_description: General overview of the administrative panel.
admin_dashboard_content: Main panel with quick access to all administrative functions.
admin_reports_description: Generate reports on application usage and user statistics.
admin_reports_content: Area for generating and exporting usage reports.
admin_security_description: Manage security policies and monitor access.
admin_security_content: Panel for security settings and access monitoring.
admin_settings_description: Configure global parameters of the application.
admin_settings_content: Area for adjusting general settings, such as API keys and integrations.
admin_users_description: View, edit, and manage user accounts.
admin_users_content: Table with all registered users, with search and editing options.
logout_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to log out?
logout_confirm_desc: You will be returned to the login screen.
